CustomField.description: This field will house a url to the magazine issue proof for the month
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will house a partial URL to the magazine issue proof for the month. Preloaded with http://fivestarprofessional.com. Enter the FTP location of the PDF (Ex: /content/images/EssentialLivingMag/Issue102April/JohnGardner_BIC_BC_April_Proof1.pdf)
CustomField.label: Issue Proof
